snippet: A Canadian study of more than 200,000 people who completed at least one lipid profile suggests that fasting before the test is probably unnecessary.
abstract: A Canadian study of more than 200,000 people who completed at least one lipid profile suggests that fasting before the test is probably unnecessary.

headline.main: Cholesterol Tests May Not Hinge on Fasting
headline.print_headline: Vital Signs | Screening: Cholesterol Tests May Not Hinge on Fasting
